p: Based on one of the studies on Bidens pilosa L., the plant exhibited a vasorelaxant effect on precontracted rat aorta induced by the KCl ( Nguelefack et al., 2005). Besides, it also exhibited vasodilating activity on norepinephrine-induced tonic contraction. The endothelium of the vascular managed to secrete contractile factors and relaxant that caused regulation of vascular tone. The chemical and physical stimulations are responded by the endothelial cells, by producing prostacyclin, nitric oxide, and bradykinin which are the relaxant factors ( Corvol et al., 1993; Dimo et al., 2001).
